result.name: special-import-special-treatment-certificates-for-imported-use-of-veterinary-medicines
result.notes: These certificates are produced and released to the applicant upon approval of an application to import a medicine from outside the UK.

organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Special Import/Special Treatment Certificates for imported use of veterinary medicines

extras.value: This information is confidential and will not be released. However, details of products imported under the Scheme will henceforth be disclose (see 'What we will publish' below).
